Articles.Content: Pack Of Awesome. This is in essence a pack that contains a bunch of aircraft that i have made that I consider worthwhile sharing with the world. Aircraft. The Bolt. > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > The Bolt was one of my first designs. Built with no goals in mind it is quite capable of filling multiple roles. However it does have major drawbacks in regard to top speed and turn radius. > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > Stock varient > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > Spoiler > > > > > > > > > > > > > > ![uFMvE7O.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/uFMvE7O.jpg) > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > This design contains no action groups > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > [http://www./download/p1j389o9oveyrja/Bolt+LR.craft](http://www./download/p1j389o9oveyrja/Bolt+LR.craft) > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > BD varient > > > > > > > > > > > > Spoiler > > > > > > > > > ![JRJ9Bq1.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/JRJ9Bq1.jpg) > > > > > > > > > > > > 1: Opens cargo bay > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > 2:Fires weapon > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > 3: Selects next weapon > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > [http://www./download/9aoh69n1ou70ni3/Bolt+A.craft](http://www./download/9aoh69n1ou70ni3/Bolt+A.craft) > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > The Falcon. > > > > > > > > > > > > > The falcon weighs in at 18.6 tons and is semi based off of the wing profile of the SU-47. It is a really good turner and Is capable of pulling a lot of g forces. > > > > > > > > > > BD varient > > > > Spoiler > > > ![q3UdK85.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/q3UdK85.jpg) > > > > [http://www./download/7wi2bd4d9edy1z6/Falcon+BD.craft](http://www./download/7wi2bd4d9edy1z6/Falcon+BD.craft) > > > > > 1:Switches engine mode. > > > > > 2:Fires selected weapons > > > > > 3:Selects next weapon > > > > > 4:Chaff > > > > > 5:Flares > > > > Stock variant > > > > Spoiler > > > ![ZwZCEHG.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/ZwZCEHG.jpg)[http://www./download/vg6yu77938x7yd4/Falcon%282%29.craft](http://www./download/vg6yu77938x7yd4/Falcon%282%29.craft) > > > > > 1:Switches engine mode. > > > > > > > > > > The Dragonfly. > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > The dragonfly is a high speed interceptor designed to intercept targets at high speeds. Its main claim to fame is speed retention able to perform turns at speed around 300-400m/s without losing a large amount of speed. > > > > > BD variant > > > > Spoiler > > > ![5WIomin.png](http://i.imgur.com/5WIomin.png) > > > > [http://www./download/dw7ctcjcj3qdd63/Dragonfly+BD.craft](http://www./download/dw7ctcjcj3qdd63/Dragonfly+BD.craft) > > > > > 1:Fires selected weapons > > > > > 2:Selects next weapon > > > > > 3:Flares > > > > > 4:Chaff > > > > Stock variant > > > > Spoiler > > > ![SGnMC2M.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/SGnMC2M.jpg) > > > > [http://www./download/mqos4dwmshj1mtj/Dragonfly.craft](http://www./download/mqos4dwmshj1mtj/Dragonfly.craft) > > > > > No action groups > > > > The Metronome. > > > > > > > > > > > > > Designed to take the new panther engine where to there maximum potential this design is really maneuverable perhaps too much so due to its tendency to explode we don't recommend turning at all above 180 m/s however besides that its a beast to fly and can even do rolls with just the yaw. > > > > > 1:Fire > > > > > 2:Change weapon > > > > > 3:Flares > > > > > 4:Chaff > > > > > 5: Afterburner > > > > > With BD > > > > > http://www./download/7r0r4l7efebxtbg/Metronome+BD.craft > > > > > Without BD > > > > > [http://www./download/y2wi9443537nydc/Metronome.craft](http://www./download/y2wi9443537nydc/Metronome.craft) > > > > > > > > The BRTBRT. > > > > > > > > > > For lack of the better name i decided to call my attacker heavily based off the A-10 warthog the Brt brt Because there is nothing scarier to a tank then hearing that noise coming over the hills. > > > > > Comes equipped with a single 30mm Gau-8, 4 Maverick missiles, 8 hell-fire missiles, 3 Hydra rocket pods, 2 Aim 9 missiles, And the ability to deliver freedom to any unsuspecting tank column. > > > > > [http://www./download/875u4ddi7u63ejx/Brt+brt.craft](http://www./download/875u4ddi7u63ejx/Brt+brt.craft) > > > > > The Peregrine. > > This fills a similar role to the brt brt except this focuses more on bombing ground units rather then destroying them with a big gun. Comes equipped with 3 500 lb bombs 2 50 cal machine guns in the wings and a dual 50 cal turret on the back. [http://www./download/rapd39kkyps5ddf/Peregrine.craft](http://www./download/rapd39kkyps5ddf/Peregrine.craft) 1: Fire 2: Switches weapons Peregrine B Variant Deciding that 3 bombs were not effective it was decided that the best solution was to mount 1 75mm howitzers to the design. [http://www./download/eb7fr17lbrbb554/Peregrine+B.craft](http://www./download/eb7fr17lbrbb554/Peregrine+B.craft) > > The Duck. > > > > > > [http://www./download/vlpj0n8q9akf6ok/Duck.craft](http://www./download/vlpj0n8q9akf6ok/Duck.craft) > > > > > Introducing the duck a flying cargo plane capable of going anywhere on kerbin. comes equipped with a light weight mining rover that can be deployed to mine ore. It also comes equipped with an ore refinery so it can create liquid fuel from the ore. Did i mention that it can also land on water. > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > Tanks. > > > > > > > > The Sabertooth. > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > Named after the Big cat of prehistoric times it is Capable of filling multiple roles From Antitank to Anti Air. The Sabertooth comes equipped with the Direwolf modular weapon system allowing it to switch out weapons systems depending on the situation. From laser to cruise missiles and everything in between you should find them useful in engaging multiple threats. The frame itself comes equipped with a radar receiver allowing you to use radar guided missiles without making yourself a target. Overall this makes the wolf obsolete in nearly all regard. > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > Action groups: > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > 1 Fires the selected weapon > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > 2 Selects the next weapon > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > 3 Selects the previous weapon > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > Download Weapon modules here. > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > [http://www./download/qwh7ou5yvpl97cv/Subassemblies.rar](http://www./download/qwh7ou5yvpl97cv/Subassemblies.rar) > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > Download the actual Sabertooth chassis here. > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > [http://www./download/26jzlgnr1zcchv7/Sabertooth.craft](http://www./download/26jzlgnr1zcchv7/Sabertooth.craft) > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > The Panther. > > > > > > > > The best tank i have ever built that looks nice this tank has been days in the making. Equipped with 1 30mm chain-gun for A2A and destruction of light ground vehicles however this nothing compared to the 2 howitzers it uses to engage heavy vehicles from any range. No matter if you are 4 km or 500m this tank will kill you if you let it. > > > > > Action groups: > > > > > 1 Fires the selected weapon > > > > > 2 Selects the next weapon > > > > > Download here > > > > > [http://www./download/tx85kwkgdtkcvv7/Panther.craft](http://www./download/tx85kwkgdtkcvv7/Panther.craft) > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > . > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > **Edited December 17, 2015 by gag09**

I am glad you enjoy it. And it is definitely a fun bird to fly its maneuverable enough but not too much and is well balanced. However I prefer the dragonfly mainly due to lighter weight and higher top speed.

Introducing the duck a flying cargo plane capable of going anywhere on kerbin. comes equipped with a light weight mining rover that can be deployed to mine ore. It also comes equipped with an ore refinery so it can create liquid fuel from the ore. Did i mention that it can also land on water.
[url=http://abload.de/image.php?img=screenshot1674avlo6.png][img]http://abload.de/img/screenshot1674avlo6.png[/img][/url] Updated the falcon to KSP 1.0.5 And modified the look of the OP.
Added a BD armed falcon and redesigned the dragonfly so it now looks nicer then it did before.[IMG]http://abload.de/img/screenshot1769tnqw7.png[/IMG]

Added the Brt brt  

[IMG]http://abload.de/img/screenshot1796s2s73.png[/IMG]  

For lack of the better name i decided to call my attacker heavily based off the A-10 warthog the Brt brt because there is nothing scarier to a tank then hearing that noise coming over the hills.  

Comes equipped with a single 30mm Gau-8, 4 Maverick missiles, 8 hell-fire missiles, 3 Hydra rocket pods, 2 Aim 9 missiles, And the ability to deliver freedom to any unsuspecting tank column.   

[url]http://www./download/qbxmbbu8w87gm70/Brt+brt.craft[/url]

What goes around comes around, unless we all put some effort into not only building but reviewing others craft, Spacecraft Fridays is the best place to start and look for others who have not had feedback for their cool stuff.

Should i release the swift carrier rig. i built it specifically to carry a lot of weight in the most innovative way possible. instead of building 1 large carrier craft i strapped multiple tiny ones together however as a result it looks really weird.

![kSDi5gB.png](http://i.imgur.com/kSDi5gB.png)![VGdse7E.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/VGdse7E.jpg)

Capable of lifting around 1000 tons the only issue it has is its tendency to explode on the runway due to having a lot of weight not spread out all that well. however it still is useful for lifting entire launch stages if you wanted to do that sort of thing for some reason.

This guy is crazy-

I would literally pay money, REAL money to see this guy make a video with Danny2462. It would be nuts!! This guy flew ZEKE'S SHUTTLE... WITH NOTHING BUT SWIFTS... if that's not crazy and insane in every way, then I don't know what is. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif ":P")![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

In all seriousness, he is awesome and I'd like to see him do a video with Danny2462.

Oh, and did I mention that perfect masterpiece that is his new profile pic? It's bewtifool.
